notes.text: The MultiValueField binding to a JSON model is now publicly available
We now ensure that the criticality remains correct after the creation of a new entity, by ensuring the update event is always triggered
We now ensure that the Discard Draft popup works correctly when navigating away from a subobject page
We now correctly encode the hash used for email URLs
We now ensure a state check for empty rows with duplicate IDs is added
Weâ€™ve resolved an issue with adding filter fields as a variant or flex change
You can now overwrite localization messages for Save and Create actions
We now show the generic message for actions that fail with strict handling with the action name
You can now correctly navigate between newly created items in sticky mode
We now ensure sorting of columns using navigation properties is done correctly
We now ensure that page navigation still works in apps using the flexible column layout after navigating to another application
We now show recent values in the correct order according to the values in the filter field, with the latest at the top
We now ensure that semantic object mappings are correctly applied when navigating from a DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation using a button
We now clear the selection in a table after applying a search or a filter, except for responsive tables
